basics_description: XML definition, purposes and applications of XML, XML file structure, syntax correctness rules
structure_description: Elements, attributes, tags, syntactic correctness, creating valid XML documents
namespaces_description: XMLNS - XML namespaces, application and implementation
tools_description: Working with XML editors, especially Liquid XML Studio
dtd_description: Introduction to DTD, declaring elements and attributes in DTD
advanced_dtd_description: Entities in DTD, FPI (Formal Public Identifier), practical application of DTD
